data.text: @OklahomaCovid All the numbers are lower because people stopped getting tested. So no way we really know what the situation is. But you can bet it’s worse than what is being reported.
@BryanWenzel @OklahomaCovid Me too. It makes sense until something changes.
@CynthiaCWoods @OklahomaCovid Most times I'm the only one wearing a mask.
@j_heidelberger @JessinOkie @OklahomaCovid Didn't say I was happy with it, but that's the (cynical?) thinking...

@RichardWWard1 @JessinOkie @OklahomaCovid It’s a little hard to move on when half the people in this country don’t vaccinate, wear mask or stay home when infected until they’re so sick they end up in the hospital/ICU begging for help!
@DRhodey We will follow the CDC guidance but always err on the side of wearing a mask...

@j_heidelberger @CynthiaCWoods @OklahomaCovid Same here in my doctors office. Lobby is FULL of unmasked people. It's mind blowing that it is allowed. You are suppose to feel safe there. It makes a person wonder if you can even trust them with your health. Sad!

@profamymcgovern @chemdocmommy @OklahomaCovid They’re reacting to people’s foolishness instead of safety! Let them go to work in the hospitals and be forced to put their lives on the line daily and see if they change their minds..Stupidity and pandering since elections are coming up..
